actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

official_title: To stop excessive toll hikes which harm our local economies, small businesses, and hard working families.

summary.text: Stop Excessive Toll Hikes Act - Revises urbanized area formula grant eligibility requirements to allow a recipient (person, entity, or state or regional authority) to receive such a grant only if it certifies that it has not raised the maximum tolls for any bridge or tunnel by more than 10% during the previous 5 fiscal years.

titles.title: To stop excessive toll hikes which harm our local economies, small businesses, and hard working families.
